column1: Trump claims 'very good experts' told him the coronavirus 'would never affect' the US, despite multiple officials publicly warning of an impending outbreak (what are the chances he saw his optimistic 'very good experts' on @FoxNews?). https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-very-good-experts-said-coronavirus-would-never-affect-us-2020-4?utmSource=twitter&utmContent=referral&utmTerm=topbar&referrer=twitter via @businessinsider
